This is Episode 1 of a 5 part video series entitled Ubiquity of Mathematics. I am grateful to the Department of Mathematics, the Fields Institute, Richard Cerezo, and Andrea MacLeod for making this project happen. I also thankful the mathematicians interviewed for this series:

  • Spyros Alexakis
  • Ingrid Daubechies
  • Charles Fefferman
  • Adrian Nachman
  • Luis Seco
